title: He who rests rusts
brief_description: An animated film demonstrating the necessity for consistent training and exercise in maintaining physical fitness. The champion cat athlete becomes complacent and therefore loses a challenge race.
description: An animated film demonstrating the necessity for consistent training and exercise in maintaining physical fitness. The champion cat athlete becomes complacent and therefore loses a challenge race.
